## Description

A collection of functions
related to the nonparametric bootstrap.

## Installation

You can install the released version of `nBootstrap` from [GitHub](https://github.com/jeksterslab/nBootstrap) with:

```r
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("jeksterslab/nBootstrap")
```

## More Information

See [GitHub Pages](https://jeksterslab.github.io/nBootstrap/index.html)
for package documentation.
